page.title: 19WALKER'S CRISPS FACTORY.
page.content: Industrial units share rural surroundings with residential areas in the new Beaumont Leys development area.A good example is the nine acre site of the Walker's Crisps factory,built in 1982,at a cost of 3.5 million pounds.The factory employs 500 people who just make the crisps.They turn out 1,100 boxes(48 packets per box)each hour.There are three shifts,each of 8 hours,per day. The best selling flavour on the market is Ready Salted,closely followed by Salt&Vinegar,then Cheese &Onion.The Walker's company advertise heavily on T.V.to promote their products using famous comedians like Ronnie Barker and Little and Large.
